summary.name: Carley Brooks- Airpod Maxes
summary.description: My media object is the apple airpod maxes. The newest edition of headphones that apple has come out with it. I will be reserching general parts and manufacturing stories of how this objects end project is made

overview.name: Stainless steel
overview.description: Located on the headwrap of the Airpod Maxes is the canopy spanning the headband. This is made out of the stainless steel which is wrapped with a soft-to-the-touch material making a combination of strength, flexibility, and comfort. The stainless steel headband is wrapped in a soft polyurethane material.These are on the sides of the airpod maxes. They help to shorten or elongate the headphones. Stainless steel is made up of iron, carbon, nickel and many other metals. The Carajás iron complex in Brazil constitutes a banded iron formation and ranks among the world's largest iron ore deposits. Which led me to assume that most Stainless steel is being imported from Brazil to Luxshare Headquarters to be used in the crafting of Airpod Maxes.

overview.name: Lithium-ion battery
overview.description: Lithium-ion is the most popular rechargeable battery chemistry used today. Lithium-ion Batteries are inside iPhone, Laptops, vaping devices, tablets, and even, E-Bikes.Futher helping you do all kinds of things in all kinds of places.Rechargeable lithium-ion technology currently provides the best performance for your device. Two battery cells, both in the same ear cup. The large and rapid increase in lithium Ore Reserves has resulted from the new mines that have been established over the last two years in Australia. Australia is strategically positioned to fulfill this demand in the ion battery, boasting significant lithium resources primarily located in Western Australia. From my research of these Lithium Ore Reserves, I infer from western Australia these batteries with their large demand are sent to many different Luxshare facilities.

overview.name: Bronze & Copper
overview.description: The Escondida Mine is a surface mine situated in Antofagasta, Chile. Owned by BHP Group, the greenfield mine produced an estimated 882.1 thousand tonnes of copper in 2023. Copper and tin are the two elements to make Bronze. There are many elements in the Airpod max tear down that use Copper and Bronze. Sometimes it is melted down to help make up something, other times it is solid. From these mines in Chile, they then transport these elements to Luxshare Headquarters to help build and assemble the Airpod Maxes.

overview.name: Silicon
overview.description: China plays a significant role in silicon metal production and is a leading exporter of this product. Given that silicon metal smelting requires considerable energy, production capacity is primarily concentrated in regions like the northwest and southwest, which have ample access to power resources. Silicon is used in the Ear Cushions of the Airpod maxes. Silicone consists of carbon, hydrogen, & oxygen Silicon is derived from silica, which originates from sand. The process of producing silicon is intricate and comprises multiple stages. After the silicon itself is made it is then sent off to Luxshare Headquarters to be combined with other elements to assemble the end product.

overview.name: Digital Crown
overview.description: You can utilize the Digital Crown and the noise control button, situated on the right headphone, to manage audio playback, handle phone calls and FaceTime calls, and summon Siri. With the Digital Crown and noise control button, you can perform various actions, including playing and pausing audio content. Simply press the Digital Crown. Since Digital crown is an "Apple Made '' product I inferred that its location would be that of the headquarters alongside the assembly of the map.

overview.name: Aluminum
overview.description: In the ear cushions is where most of the Aluminum is located . Aluminum comes from Bauxites rocks. They are composed of aluminum oxides along with other minerals. The company Aluminum Corporation of China that operates as a subsidiary, holds the title of the largest global manufacturer and distributor of alumina, aluminum, fine alumina, & high purity aluminum. After the company produces it, I can assume that it is sent off to Luxshare Headquarters to be combined with other elements to assemble the end product.

location.address: Beijing, People's Republic of China. (Aluminum Corporation of China Limited)

overview.name: Apple H1 chip
overview.description: Apple H1 headphone chip located in each ear cup. The chip enables features such as noise cancellation, in-ear detection, and device switching. It is located inside Ear cup grilles. The H1 is made up of Microprocessors which are made from silicon, quartz, metals, and other chemicals. As the Digital Crown is a product made by Apple, I deduced that its assembly location would likely be at the company's headquarters, alongside the mapping process.

overview.name: Logic Board
overview.description: The Logic Board (sometimes called the Motherboard) holds and allows communication between many of the crucial electronic components of a system. Located in the ear cushions. The logic Board ensures that all functions are working properly. The logic board is like the backbone of the product. It connects and manages all the different parts inside. It helps the main brain of the Airpods, called the CPU, talk to the other parts and share information between them. Because the Logic Board is a spefici apple component tt's probable that the assembly of the product takes place at the main office of Luxshare, where they also handle assembely

overview.name: lighting port
overview.description: To charge AirPods Max, you have to use the Lightning cable that came with your AirPods Max into the bottom-right earphone. You can use a USB-C to Lightning Cable or a USB to Lightning Cable.The lighting port is the place that the charger plugs into the headphones

overview.name: Iron
overview.description: Iron ore serves as the primary source of iron for global iron and steel industries, making it indispensable for steel production. "Almost all (98%) iron ore is used in steelmaking". This means that Iron and stainless steel are ultimately connected and needed to make the other. Iron is used in many different places to assemble the airpodmaxes, whether it is used to make another raw material or melted down to something, it is a raw material that is crucial when discussing the manufacturing of Airpod maxes.

overview.name: Polyester
overview.description: Polyester can be found in the canopy spanning headband that is made from a breathable knit mesh. Polyester is a material which is used to create fiber that can be woven or knit. The ear cushions and memory foam creating the outer layer of the ear pieces are also made out of a form of Polyester. Polyester is one of the most popular and demanding fabrics. Alpek One Of The Largest Polyester Manufacturing Companies In The World. It is located in Charlotte North Carolina. Because Aplek is the largest source of Polyester I predict that from Charlotte NC, it will either go to a closer Luxshare, or it will continue to be sent to the Headquarters where the products are assembled.

overview.name: Luxshare Headquarters (assembly of Airpod Maxes)
overview.description: Luxshare is a Chinese electronic components manufacturer. The company was listed publicly on the SME board of the Shenzhen Stock Exchange in 2010. Luxshare says explains they focus on technological innovations in the industry and efficiently fulfill different needs from our global clients. Founded in 2004 Luxshare plays a crucial role in the Apple supply chain and has previously assembled various Apple products. All raw materials are sent to this location for assembly. It operates as an assembly company and is one of Apple's most frequently utilized assembly firms. Headquarters means provider of a creation, aimed at providing comprehensive services for content development, production, and more. This is why majority of the raw materials are being sent to this location and not the other Luxshare distribution centers listed. Assuming this location probably has more space, resources for assembly, workers and more, it is safe to infer most of the manufacturing and assembly will occur here.

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center  (US California)
overview.description: A distribution center is a facility, such as a warehouse or specialized building equipped with refrigeration or air conditioning, where products are stored for later distribution to retailers, wholesalers, or consumers. Luxshare has numerous distribution sites, but this one holds significance as it's situated in the US. Given Luxshare's Chinese origin as an electronics manufacturer, this location aligns with many Apple stores across America, where sales often surpass those in Asia. Additionally, California's abundance of Apple store locations makes this distribution center a logical choice for stocking products efficiently.

location.address: Milpitas, CA. United States. 480 N McCarthy Blvd

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center (Baoding, China)
overview.description: I considered it crucial to show multiple distribution centers, particularly across Asia, given Luxshare roots in China. Additionally, with numerous Apple and technology resale outlets in the region, these centers can efficiently supply products for resale. Considering the prominence of technology and media industry in Asia, including China, having multiple Luxshare distribution centers in the area seems logical. It's anticipated that regions heavily involved in media would represent significant consumer markets for new Apple products.

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center (Changzhi, China)
overview.description: Having multiple distribution centers across Asia is crucial, given Luxshare roots in China. With numerous Apple and technology resale stores in the region, these centers can efficiently supply products to meet demand. Given the prominence of tech and media in Asia, especially in China, having distribution centers in the area makes strategic sense. When companies like Apple release new products, media-savvy regions are likely to be major consumers, making the presence of distribution centers essential. These distro centers I can assume are sending product to the apple store also listed in China.

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center (Chuzhou, Anhui. China)
overview.description: Again, establishing numerous distribution hubs across Asia is imperative. The abundance of Apple and technology retail outlets in the region enhances the efficiency of these centers in meeting market demands. Given the tech and media dominance in Asia, locating distribution centers in these areas is prudent. This is another location in China that send product to other places in Asia or even maybe to places in the US or even Europe considering they are next to one another.

location.address: Chuzhou, Anhui. China. No.8 Yongyang Road

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center (Dongguan, Guangdong Province. China)
overview.description: These centers efficiently cater to demand, given the abundance of Apple and technology resale stores in the region. Strategically locating distribution centers there is wise. I wonder is Luxshare is thinking about the location to stores or consumers when they build new distro centers.

location.address: Dongguan, Guangdong Province. China. No.17 Kuiqing road, Qinghuang Industrial Zone.

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center
overview.description: Luxshare in China has over 21 office locations. As explained before Asia is in high demand when it comes to Tech and Media, which helps explain all the different listed Distro centers and how product will be send and moved from all over out of this locations.

location.address: China, Fuzhou, Cangshan, White Lake Pavilion Cangshan Science and Technology Park 2, District 4

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center
overview.description: Luxshare in China has over 21 office locations. As explained before Asia is in high demand when it comes to Tech and Media, which helps explain all the different listed Distro centers and how product will be send and moved from all over out of this locations.

overview.name: Luxshare Distribution center
overview.description: Luxshare in China has over 21 office locations. As explained before Asia is in high demand when it comes to Tech and Media, which helps explain all the different listed Distro centers and how product will be send and moved from all over out of this locations.

overview.name: Apple Store in NYC, Fifth Avenue
overview.description: During the official launch of the Apple Fifth Avenue store, Steve Jobs personally greeted the first customers, marking it as one of the most popular Apple stores. With over 57 million visitors at the time, it stands out as a significant location, particularly in New York City, one of five U.S. cities with over 1,000 Apple employees. The store's popularity suggests a rapid flow of money and products. Additionally, it's likely that the Luxshare distribution center in California sends a considerable number of product to this location. Looking ahead, I wonder about whether Luxshare will invest in a distribution center in NYC, given its status as a cultural melting pot and a hub for international commerce.

overview.name: Apple Store in Jing'an
overview.description: Located in Shanghai, the Apple Store attracts over 1 million daily visitors worldwide. It's likely that some of the listed distribution centers send products to these stores due to their proximity compared to stores in the US. As a relatively new establishment, this Apple store generates interest from people curious about its appearance, potentially leading to increased sales.

location.address: (Shanghai) China, 1-2F, Tower 2, Daning International Commercial Plaza, No. 1878 Gonghexin Road,Shanghai

overview.name: Apple Store in Beijing
overview.description: The Apple Store in Beijing likely receives products from some of the listed distribution centers due to their closer proximity compared to those in the US. Beijing is a major travel destination, and travelers often make new purchases during their trips, presenting an opportunity for increased sales.

location.address: Beijing apm, No. 138 Wangfujing Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing

overview.name: Apple Store in Chongqing
overview.description: Yet another location in Asia because it is important to show the many apple store even I had never heard about. This store will receive product at a faster rate because of the short distance from the distro locations.

location.address: Chongqing, Paradise Walk Chongqing Paradise Walk

overview.name: Apple Store in California
overview.description: I chose this retail location because it's nearest to the Luxshare distribution center in Milpitas, CA. I anticipate that products from this center are likely sent to the Apple store in LA Beverly Hills due to its reputation as a popular shopping destination. Given the high foot traffic and purchasing power in the area, it makes sense to send a large quantity of stock there. California has the highest concentration of Apple suppliers and app economy jobs of any state.

overview.name: Apple Store in Florida
overview.description: Florida's popularity as a state to reside in suggests that Apple store locations likely attract a substantial number of customers in this region. Miami, being one of the most sought-after travel destinations, makes this particular Apple store an ideal spot for visitors to make purchases. Based on this, I speculate that the Luxshare distribution center in California sends Apple AirPod Maxes to this retail outlet, considering the significant data and the larger population in the area. The equipment used to do advanced testing of the MacBook Pro display and Touch Bar is made in Florida.

overview.name: Apple Store in Chicago IL
overview.description: Among all the Apple stores in Chicago, this particular location experiences significant demand. Given the high population density of the state and the distribution center in California being the sole one in the country, it's reasonable to assume that this popular store will receive ample stock of the specific product, anticipating higher sales. Illinois is a top 10 state for number of suppliers, direct Apple employment, and app economy jobs.
